title: Message IX, Job 9:29--'If I Be Wicked, Why Then Labour I in Vain?'
credit_line: Gift of Aluminum Company of America
provenance_text:
G. David Thompson, Pittsburgh, PA, 1961 until June 26, 1965 [1]; G. David Thompson estate, June 1965-November 1966; The Aluminum Company of America, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1966-October 4, 1984 [2]; gift to Museum, October 1984.

Notes:
[1]. Photograph 23.61 in G. David Thompson archives, CMOA.  The work was included in the 1961 Carnegie International (no. 128).
[2]. Part of the Alcoa Collection of Contemporary Art.  This work was included in an exhibition of works acquired by Alcoa from the G. David Thompson collection (no. 17) held at Carnegie Institute in 1967, followed by a multi-year national tour.
